verses.verse: Israel <WH3478> is an empty <WH1238> vine <WH1612>, he bringeth forth <WH7737> fruit <WH6529> unto himself: according to the multitude <WH7230> of his fruit <WH6529> he hath increased <WH7235> the altars <WH4196>; according to the goodness <WH2896> of his land <WH776> they have made goodly <WH2895> images <WH4676>. an: or, a vine emptying the fruit which it giveth images: Heb. statues, or, standing images

Their heart <WH3820> is divided <WH2505>; now shall they be found faulty <WH816>: he shall break down <WH6202> their altars <WH4196>, he shall spoil <WH7703> their images <WH4676>. Their heart: or, He hath divided their heart break: Heb. behead images: Heb. statues, or, standing images
For now they shall say <WH559>, We have no king <WH4428>, because we feared <WH3372> not the LORD <WH3068>; what then should a king <WH4428> do <WH6213> to us?

They have spoken <WH1696> words <WH1697>, swearing <WH422> falsely <WH7723> in making <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285>: thus judgment <WH4941> springeth up <WH6524> as hemlock <WH7219> in the furrows <WH8525> of the field <WH7704>.

The inhabitants <WH7934> of Samaria <WH8111> shall fear <WH1481> because of the calves <WH5697> of Bethaven <WH1007>: for the people <WH5971> thereof shall mourn <WH56> over it, and the priests <WH3649> thereof that rejoiced <WH1523> on it, for the glory <WH3519> thereof, because it is departed <WH1540> from it. the priests: or, Chemarim

It shall be also carried <WH2986> unto Assyria <WH804> for a present <WH4503> to king <WH4428> Jareb <WH3377>: Ephraim <WH669> shall receive <WH3947> shame <WH1317>, and Israel <WH3478> shall be ashamed <WH954> of his own counsel <WH6098>.
As for Samaria <WH8111>, her king <WH4428> is cut off <WH1820> as the foam <WH7110> upon <WH6440> the water <WH4325>. the water: Heb. the face of the water

The high places <WH1116> also of Aven <WH206>, the sin <WH2403> of Israel <WH3478>, shall be destroyed <WH8045>: the thorn <WH6975> and the thistle <WH1863> shall come up <WH5927> on their altars <WH4196>; and they shall say <WH559> to the mountains <WH2022>, Cover <WH3680> us; and to the hills <WH1389>, Fall <WH5307> on us.

O Israel <WH3478>, thou hast sinned <WH2398> from the days <WH3117> of Gibeah <WH1390>: there they stood <WH5975>: the battle <WH4421> in Gibeah <WH1390> against the children <WH1121> of iniquity <WH5932> did not overtake <WH5381> them.

It is in my desire <WH185> that I should chastise <WH3256> them; and the people <WH5971> shall be gathered <WH622> against them, when they shall bind <WH631> themselves in their two <WH8147> furrows <WH5869>. when: or, when I shall bind them for their two transgressions, or, in their two habitations

And Ephraim <WH669> is as an heifer <WH5697> that is taught <WH3925>, and loveth <WH157> to tread out <WH1758> the corn; but I passed over <WH5674> upon her fair <WH2898> neck <WH6677>: I will make Ephraim <WH669> to ride <WH7392>; Judah <WH3063> shall plow <WH2790>, and Jacob <WH3290> shall break his clods <WH7702>. her: Heb. the beauty of her neck

Sow <WH2232> to yourselves in righteousness <WH6666>, reap <WH7114> in <WH6310> mercy <WH2617>; break up <WH5214> your fallow ground <WH5215>: for it is time <WH6256> to seek <WH1875> the LORD <WH3068>, till he come <WH935> and rain <WH3384> righteousness <WH6664> upon you.

Ye have plowed <WH2790> wickedness <WH7562>, ye have reaped <WH7114> iniquity <WH5766>; ye have eaten <WH398> the fruit <WH6529> of lies <WH3585>: because thou didst trust <WH982> in thy way <WH1870>, in the multitude <WH7230> of thy mighty men <WH1368>.

Therefore shall a tumult <WH7588> arise <WH6965> among thy people <WH5971>, and all thy fortresses <WH4013> shall be spoiled <WH7703>, as Shalman <WH8020> spoiled <WH7701> Betharbel <WH1009> in the day <WH3117> of battle <WH4421>: the mother <WH517> was dashed in pieces <WH7376> upon her children <WH1121>.

So <WH3602> shall Bethel <WH1008> do <WH6213> unto you because <WH6440> of your great <WH7451> wickedness <WH7451>: in a morning <WH7837> shall the king <WH4428> of Israel <WH3478> utterly <WH1820> be cut off <WH1820>. your: Heb. the evil of your evil
